input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Men's Timex Expedition North Tide-Temp-Compass Watch TW2V03900'
  - Name='Timex Men's Timex Waterbury Traditional GMT Quartz Black Dial Watch TW2W22800'
  - Name='Casio Men's Watch MTP-1302P'
  - Name='Orient Classic Solar-Powered Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Q&q Falcon Military Field Watch'
  - Name='Seiko 5 Sports SRPD89'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Bracelet Watch'
  - Name='Seiko 5 Automatic Watch'
  - Name='CASIO G-SHOCK Full Metal Men's'
  - Name='Citizen BJ7100'
  - Name='Citizen NJ0190-51 Steel'
  - Name='Casio G Men's-shock Mr-g MRGB2100 Watch'
  - Name='Casio Watch LWS-2200H'
  - Name='G-shock Men's 59mm Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Men's Khaki Field Mechanical Watch'
  - Name='HAMILTON Men's Khaki Navy Scuba Auto'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Field Chronograph Date Automatic'
  - Name='Hamilton Men's Khaki Aviation Pilot Chrono Quartz'
  - Name='Skagen Men's SKW6053 Quartz Mesh Band Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Field H69439111 Steel White 38mm 2022'
  - Name='Hamilton Men's Khaki Navy Frogman Automatic'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Field Expedition Men's'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Date Field Watch'
  - Name='Men's Hamilton Khaki Navy Frogman Auto'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Classic Chronograph Sport Watch'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Timex Expedition North Tide-Temp-Compass Watch TW2V03900
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Expedition line with outdoor/adventure features, but different functionalities like tide, temperature, and compass sensors rather than titanium case and leather strap.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Timex Waterbury Traditional GMT Quartz Black Dial Watch TW2W22800
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and quartz watch, but Waterbury line is more classic/traditional and lacks titanium case and high water resistance; different style and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Watch MTP-1302P
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Basic Casio quartz watch, likely simple field style but lacks advanced features, titanium case, or higher water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Classic Solar-Powered Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Solar-powered dress watch style, differing from rugged titanium adventure watch with mechanical elements.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Q&q Falcon Military Field Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Military field watch similar in purpose and style to Expedition Scout, likely rugged and utilitarian but lacks titanium case and specific water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko 5 Sports SRPD89
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Durable sports watch with mechanical automatic movement, somewhat similar utility but differing materials and likely heavier case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Bracelet Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Citizen quartz/eco-drive watch with bracelet, less focused on rugged adventure style and titanium construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko 5 Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar in durability and automatic movement but no titanium or high water resistance; typical field watch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASIO G-SHOCK Full Metal Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly durable and shock resistant like Timex Expedition Titanium but bulkier metal construction and digital/analog hybrid; different style though similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen BJ7100
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unclear specific features, but likely a classic Citizen model without titanium or enhanced shock resistant features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen NJ0190-51 Steel
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Steel case watch differing from lightweight titanium, likely less suited for heavy outdoor use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio G Men's-shock Mr-g MRGB2100 Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end G-Shock with full metal and advanced features, very durable and shock resistant, more technical than Timex but similar in toughness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Watch LWS-2200H
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Basic Casio watch, less likely to have high water resistance or titanium case; simpler construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: G-shock Men's 59mm Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very large, rugged shock resistant watch; similar toughness but bulkier and more digital/tech-focused than traditional analog titanium field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Men's Khaki Field Mechanical Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic field watch with mechanical movement and similar size; close in style and function though titanium construction and water resistance may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HAMILTON Men's Khaki Navy Scuba Auto
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Water-resistant automatic diving watch; shares ruggedness and water resistance but different style and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Chronograph Date Automatic
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Field watch with added chronograph function and automatic movement; similar rugged use but different features and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Men's Khaki Aviation Pilot Chrono Quartz
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pilot watch style with chronograph quartz movement, related by ruggedness but different in design and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's SKW6053 Quartz Mesh Band Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Minimalist, dressy quartz watch with mesh band; quite different from rugged titanium field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Field H69439111 Steel White 38mm 2022
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 38mm field watch similar size and style with robust steel case, close to Timex in purpose but differs in material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Men's Khaki Navy Frogman Automatic
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dive watch with automatic movement and rugged construction; similar rugged intention but different style and heavier.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Expedition Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Part of Hamilton Khaki Field Expedition line, very close in outdoor/adventure field watch style, likely similar size and construction; only minor differences from titanium Timex.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Date Field Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic field watch with date function and durable construction, similar lifestyle and purpose but differing in materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Hamilton Khaki Navy Frogman Auto
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as previous Frogman model; rugged dive watch, diver-oriented rather than field watch but similar robustness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Classic Chronograph Sport Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sport chronograph watch likely more dressy/classic and less rugged or adventure-focused than Timex Expedition Titanium.
